entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.3°C

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
